channel.title: Easy Money with an iOS/Android device
channel.description:
How to make money with any iPod or android device.
Step 1) Go to the Market, App Store, or whatever you use.
Step 2) Search for JunoWallet giftcards, and download & install it.
Step 3) Go through the sign up process, link a facebook or twitter if you wish for extra JunoPoints.
Step 4) When you are done with that, go to settings and "Enter an Invite Code". Please use my code, "I would love it if﻿ someone could help me out and use my code, TM82551. It will give youa free 25 cents to start off, and it helps me out with money too.
Step 5) Go to the "earn gifts" section and do either Rewards Per Invite, Rewards Per Install, Rewards Per Fan, or one of the other options and start making money!
